body:
### Cygwin Dot Files
To use this in any cygwin install, execute this in the home directory:

```
$ curl url | tar zx
```

This will download and un-package all the files that will make your Cygwin install work like a regular Linux distro.
tagline: all necessary dot files to pull down into a fresh cygwin shell so that it feels more like a real linux/bash session
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Cygwin dot files
